name: Boningale Greensky
description: Boningale GreenSky offers an exciting range of green roof plants and substrates to suit varying aesthetic and enviromental requirements. All our skyplugs are grown specially to thrive in harsh rooftop enviroments, and our range of substrates will help you to achieve whatever performance you require from the green roof whilst supporting the plants in the long term. Boningale GreenSky helps designers and installers of green roofs by ensuring the best quality plants and the latest research are accessible to all practitioners.

product_images.title: Boningale skyplugs
product_images.description:
Skyplugs are the first plants to be grown with advice from univeristy experts to ensure better establishment and survival. Boningale greensky brings a fresh new approach to green roofing. Our aim is to provide innovative high quality products and provide the best practise advice to designers and installers of green roofs.

-Better value fr money
-Better for biodiversity
-Better choice and control over planting
-Better survival rates
